) The following subsections describe the use of the forms, worksheets and spreadsheets in the preparation of settlement computations. (
) The employee who prepares the settlement computations is responsible completing the Form
Worksheet at the time the computations are prepared. (
) The Form
Worksheet is also required for Rule
computations and statutory notices of deficiency. Generally the TCS prepares the Rule
putation or the statutory notice of deficiency and will prepare the Form Worksheet at the same time. (

This reference number reflects the change in the number of exemptions allowable. It does not reflect the adjustment to taxable income as a result of a change in the number of exemptions.
